about.title: About
about.description: The Guardbook was conjured from the dark web to help everyone support Detroit City FC.
about.feedback: Please send feedback to *@NGSDetroit* or *@Guardbook* on Twitter, or email webmaster@noonelikes.us
credits: All player headshots courtesy of *Detroit City FC*
about.hymnalplug:
is built using the open source *Hooligan Hymnal* platform.

Follow  _@hooliganhymnal_ on Twitter and visit the project repository at https://github.com/Chattahooligans

adminlogin.title: Gatekeeper Dashboard
adminlogin.failed: Login failed: Invalid username or password.

_comment: /src/screens/PostAttachmentComposePrideraiserMatch.js
This screen contains labels and prompts to compose a Post Attachment of the Prideraiser Match Update type
Prideraiser-related text can include %macros% that use live campaign data.
See /src/components/PrideraiserHelper.js for more information.
You probably don't need to change these values in your default translation.
/src/screens/PostAttachmentSelectMassInstagram.js
This screen contains labels to select a Roster for a Post Attachment of the Mass Instagram type
You probably don't need to change these values in your default translation.
postattachmentselectmassinstagram.selectroster: Tag the Players on Instagram - Select Roster

postcreate.title: Create Post
postcreate.push: Bother people with a push notification? Seriously?
postcreate.linkimageinstructions: Paste the exact web address of an image
postcreate.linkimagewarning:
WARNING:
- Performance can slow down with large images. Consider linking to a smaller version as a thumbnail
- Also, no validation or error checking is done on remotely linked images. Admins should proceed only with care and caution.

home.findthemenu: Find more features in the %menuicon% menu, top left

_comment: /src/screens/InstagramList.js

This section contains labels and prompts for the Instagram List feature, which presents a selectable text box containing player Instagram handles. Change the .heading and .instructions values to fit the message you want to present.
You WILL need to change these values in your default translation.
instagramlist.title: Instagram List
instagramlist.heading: Be the 12th on the pitch
instagramlist.instructions:
Support for the players of DCFC comes in many forms both in and out of the stadium. Messages from supporters before and after matches are meaningful and appreciated by players.

You can copy multiple Instagram handles from the box below and paste them into the caption of an Instagram post.

player.stilllooking: We are still working on a song for this player. Want to help? Submit an idea!

shop.title: Merch Shop

twitterlist.title: Roster
twitterlist.heading: Be the 12th on the pitch
twitterlist.instructions:
Support for the players of DCFC comes in many forms both in and out of the stadium. Tweets from supporters before and after matches are meaningful and appreciated by players.

You can copy multiple Twitter handles from the box below and paste them into a longer Twitter thread.

volunteer.title: Let's Make Roots
volunteer.fallback: Let's Make Roots opens in WebBrowser component

imageviewer.sharingnotavailable: Sharing not available on this platform

post.hidealertmessage: Are you sure you want to hide this post from the Feed?

_comment: /src/components/PostAttachmentPrideraiserMatch.js
This section contains labels for a Post Attachment of the Prideraiser Match Update type. .message is used if %goalCount% is greater than zero, else .messagezerogoals is used.
Prideraiser-related text can include %macros% that use live campaign data.
See /src/components/PrideraiserHelper.js for more information.
You WILL need to change these values in your default translation.
postattachmentprideraisermatch.heading: %name% Update
postattachmentprideraisermatch.message: Because of %goalCount% %goal_name_computed%, we raised $%raised% to benefit %charity_name%! Make your pledge now
postattachmentprideraisermatch.messagezerogoals: No %goal_name_computed% from this match, but we can raise %pledged_total% to benefit %charity_name% with each one. Make your pledge now

_comment: /src/screens/PostAttachmentSelectMassTweet.js
This screen contains labels to select a Roster for a Post Attachment of the Mass Tweet type
You probably don't need to change these values in your default translation.

prideraisercampaignsummary.title: %supporters_group.name% present *%name%*
